pullrequest.title: Add startup script for handsim with APL arm

content.raw: With this change, handsim_apl& will run gazebo in the background, and fg will re-attach to the process, but CTRL-C will not close gazebo (it will just detach from the process again). This is probably fine for our development/testing (just remember not to run this script in the background), but we may want to fix this behavior in the future.
content.html: With this change, handsim_apl& will run gazebo in the background, and fg will re-attach to the process, but CTRL-C will not close gazebo (it will just detach from the process again). This is probably fine for our development/testing (just remember not to run this script in the background), but we may want to fix this behavior in the future.
